release.change: Fixed a bug that would cause a crash on devices running Android 3.X.
UI updated. Drag from the left side of the screen on any page to view skin categories.
Added a setting to change currency and theme.
(Experimental) Prices for item qualities (Battle-Scarred, Factory New, etc.) are now listed.
Added Operation Breakout skins and Butterfly Knives!
Fixed a bug where the price was displayed incorrectly for skins with similar names (eg: Desert-Strike and Desert Storm).
Skins that are not available for purchase in the marketplace will show "None currently listed" instead of "$0.00".
